I would like if I may to invite any and all comers to a debate on an issue of your choice, silly or serious. I am a little rusty but would very much enjoy the oppurtunity to brush up a bit.

I would like if I may to invite any and all comers to a debate on an issue of your choice, silly or serious. I am a little rusty but would very much enjoy the oppurtunity to brush up a bit.

 
 Well I'm not very good , .. but what intrestes you.

legal, political, moral and military subjects are my favourites, but just a good honest argument makes me pretty happy. 
 Tell you what, I'll pick a topic for each of those and you can choose one and a side. 
 Trial by Jury - waste of time?
 World Government? 
 The speed camera- useful deterrent or police cash machine?
 The nuclear deterrent?
 
 Or if you don't like any of those feel free to suggest another.

Morals has always been a subject I seem to differ with a lot of folks. Pick one and we'll see what happens.
 
 P.S. I hope spelling mistakes don't bother you too much.

Ah the hard part, this means I have to find at least one moral I have to debate about... hmm...
 Religion in politics? 
 A right to retire?
 Duelling between consenting parties? 
 
 P.s. spelling mistakes like beauty are only skin deep. No worries.

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Throwing down the gauntlet...
